name: Livedocs
tagline: The general data agent
description: Livedocs is a general data agent that can do BI, ML, build dashboards, and write code and queries (anything a human data scientist would do!) Livedocs helps you understand your data instantly. Upload a CSV, spreadsheet, or connect your database, then ask questions in plain English. Livedocs uses AI to generate charts, metrics, and clear answers‚Äîno SQL, no dashboards, no setup. Built for anyone who needs insights fast, whether you‚Äôre technical or not. Just bring your data and start asking.

name: ChatGPT Health
tagline: ChatGPT designed for health and wellness
description: A dedicated space for health conversations in ChatGPT. You can securely connect medical records and wellness apps so responses are grounded in your own health information. Designed to help you navigate medical care, not replace it.

name: Spec Coding by Capacity
tagline: Vibe Coding with a planning assistant to build with clarity
description: Most AI app builders jump straight into building. That feels fast until your app gets messy, inconsistent, and nothing like what you imagined. Today, we‚Äôre introducing Spec Coding in Capacity. Instead of building immediately, Capacity now lets you define your app first with the help of an AI co-founder that asks the right questions before any code is generated. More structure upfront. Far less refactoring later. Much better results.

name: xPay
tagline: Cross-border payment gateway for enterprises
description: xPay is a powerful cross-border payment solution designed to help businesses in India, Singapore and the US seamlessly accept global payments. With 90% success rates, multi-currency support, and advanced fraud detection, xPay optimizes international transactions, reduces drop-offs, and automates compliance. Perfect for marketplaces, SaaS, and e-commerce, xPay simplifies complex payment flows and ensures a smooth, secure global experience for your business and customers.

name: Muze AI
tagline: Let AI Manage and Create Your Meta and Google ads
description: Muze is an autonomous AI that creates, runs, and optimizes performance ads end to end. No agency. No media buyers. Just connect your site and ad accounts.

name: Adventory
tagline: The indie ad markeplace to sell or find ad spots
description: Find indie apps that sell ad spots. Or list yours and get discovered. ## For app owners - List your app that has ad spots to sell - Get discovered by hundreds of SaaS founders - Get your app featured to appear on top of browsing results - Get a free backlink to boost your SEO ## For advertisers - Browse hundreds of apps that sell ad spots - Find the perfect spot to advertise your product - Review app analytics directly on our platform Looking to buy or sell ad space? Check out Adventory!

name: Flakes
tagline: A keyboard-first, AI-powered native browser for macOS.
description: Flakes is a macOS browser built for thinkers. Vim-style navigation, built-in ad blocking, a powerful command palette (‚åòK), and AI that actually understands your tabs - but it's totally optional. Check more from our website: https://flakes.ai

name: Awesome Gemini Prompts
tagline: The Ultimate Open Source Library for Gemini & Nano
description: The first dedicated open-source prompt library for Google Gemini. Finding professional prompts for complex tasks was a pain‚Äîformatting was messy and scattered everywhere. So I built this to fix it. We automatically scraped & cleaned 1,800+ prompts using a custom LLM pipeline (Qwen + Gemini) to ensure quality everyday. It's completely free, open-source, and so cool to use.

name: Intrascope.app
tagline: Centralize your team‚Äôs AI, cut costs and stay organized
description: Intrascope is a shared AI workspace that helps teams stay organized, reduce costs, and keep all AI usage in one place. Admins set providers, limits, and rules, while the team works in a simple chat with shared context and reusable Manifests. No more scattered chats or separate API keys. AI becomes structured, predictable, and safe for the whole team.

name: PingPrompt
tagline: Organize prompts, track changes, and iterate faster.
description: Most people still manage important prompts in chat history, docs, and text files. PingPrompt keeps everything in one place, tracks every change, and helps you iterate without losing what already works. Refine prompts faster with a built-in copilot, compare versions with visual diffs, and test improvements with confidence. Built for agencies, creators, no-code/low-code builders, and marketers who depend on prompts every day.

name: Biker 2.0: Bicycle track & maintain
tagline: Bike AI garage: track and maintain bicycle parts
description: Biker is a smart bike maintenance app that helps you keep track of your bikes and their components in one place. It turns your garage into a clear, organized system, helps you stay on top of maintenance, and connects you with nearby bike shops when it‚Äôs time for service. This version does three important things: - It removes ‚Äúhealth analysis‚Äù promises you can‚Äôt fully prove - It emphasizes tracking, history, and clarity - It positions AI as a helper, not a magic oracle

name: Alias Bot
tagline: Replace repeated @mentions in Slack with channel aliases
description: Teams often end up typing long @Alice @Bob @Charlie mentions cluttering the channel. Sometimes, some people get missed or the wrong person gets tagged. This gets worse with rotating or short-lived teams (on-call, releases, incidents). Alias Bot lets you define channel-scoped aliases (e.g. !reviewers, !oncall) so mentions expand to the right people for that channel, without needing to manage org-wide user groups.

name: NexTalk
tagline: The missing voice input for Linux. Beautiful Private Offline
description: A modern voice input tool built exclusively for Linux. Featuring a transparent "capsule" UI, 100% offline inference (Sherpa-onnx), and native Fcitx5 integration. Sub-20ms latency.

name: CompanyIntel.io
tagline: Everything you need to know about a company ‚Äî instantly
description: CompanyIntel.io turns scattered public data into clear, actionable company intelligence. Unlike traditional data tools that dump raw firmographics, CompanyIntel surfaces confidence-scored insights on growth, risk, momentum, and buying signals. Built for GTM, sales, and strategy teams, it delivers live company context in seconds via UI or API ‚Äî so teams can make better decisions without manual research.

name: ChatSEO
tagline: Find & prioritize your SEO wins by chatting with your data.
description: The all-in-one SEO tool that connects to your Google Search Console and market data. Just ask any question and get clear, actionable next steps to grow your traffic in Google and AI search.

name: AI Analytics Hub
tagline: Founder-built directory of AI analytics tools
description: Explore the emerging landscape of AI tools for data and business analytics, hand-built and vetted by two analytics practitioners. Updated bi-weekly.

name: Pro Planner
tagline: Achieve 10X More Goals Without Burning Out
description: Most to-do lists are dumb. They don't care if you fail. Pro Planner AI is different. It cares. It has Contextual Memory: it remembers your knee injury, your stressful board meeting, and your family goals. Every Sunday, it walks you through a Deep Review of your week, not to judge you, but to help you pivot. It‚Äôs the accountability partner you‚Äôve always wanted.

name: Compozy
tagline: AI SDLC, Code while you sleep with Compozy!
description: Compozy standardizes and orchestrates the entire AI software lifecycle‚Äîfrom PRD to PR‚Äîso teams ship faster with less rework, lower token waste, and full traceability.

name: getsignals(in)
tagline: Turns likes and comments into buyers you can reach now
description: Cold outbound isn't dead, but your playbook probably is. Cheap b2b data with high-volume, low-effort tactics have killed outbound reply rates. GTM playbooks need to evolve. Social signals are a game changer that monitor your brand, competitors, thought leaders and industry topics to surface buyer intent and problem-aware leads. We automatically turn social engagement discovered, into real contacts with enriched data + contact info, then push leads to your tech stack. All on autopilot üöÄüöÄüöÄ

name: n8n AI Workflow Assistant
tagline: Build n8n automations in seconds with natural language
description: Stop manually configuring n8n nodes. Just describe what you want. This Chrome extension adds an AI assistant directly into n8n Cloud. Describe your automation in plain English ‚Üí get a ready-to-use workflow with configured nodes and documentation. ‚ú® What makes it different: - Agentic Mode builds complex multi-step workflows iteratively - Supports GPT-4, GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet & Opus - Auto-generates sticky notes explaining each step - Your API keys stay local‚Äîwe never see your data
